titleStmt.title: The late eclipse unclasped: or the mistaken star-gazers unmasked. VVherein is manifested seven severall reasons whereby these astrolegers have deceived the people. / By a learned divine neere London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in the year, that many did fear, that Doomes-day it was nigh: but now we do see, what star-gazers be, for they have fore-told a lye,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the year, that many did fear, that Doomes-day it was nigh: but now we do see, what star-gazers be
